summary: Simply texture varients of UNP and CBBE bodies - Possibly more body types coming in the future :)
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/d7e8/2s8xbi6co00dzy6fg.jpg[/img]


[b][size=4]- New Information -[/size][/b]

[b][size=3]I'm going to be taking this in a new direction (time permitting as I'm now back to my full time job), I'm going to be making many skin variations now, not just pale skins, as well as slowly offer support for other bodies (not just UNP based ones) but as I use Sevenbase (which is UNP based) I will be making variations for that before any other body.
[/size][/b]
[size=4]- Description -
[/size]
Replaces the skin textures for UNP and UNPB based bodies to make the skin more pale and darken the nipples, both entirely for personal taste, but figured I'd share it with everyone.

[size=3]- Requirements -[/size]

[b]Any of the following UNP-Based body replacement mods[/b]

DIMONIZED UNP female body - dimon99
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?

or

UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT - Blessed Redux Project team
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?

or

SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer - [b]Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?

[b][size=4]or[/size][/b]

[b]Any of the following CBBE-Based Body replacement mods[/b]

Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- - [b]Caliente
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?

[/b]or

CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod - [b]CherryHotaling[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?



- Credits -

[b]AnTiWoMaAgNoT - For the CBBE body textures and UNP body textures once I redo those.

[/b]and

Blessed Redux Project team - For the original UNP body textures (and a great body replacement xD)
TheOniNinja - For original body freckles (from RaceMenu Overlay Compilation)
